description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Hunt cows!  The ultimate bounty hunter in the galaxy or a milk deliverer, Tusneal Poyanski - real name Tsuneo - is a milk deliverer. To compensate for milk Tsuneo foolhardily gulped down, he is questing through universe! (The story up to this point has little connection to the context of the game.) Side-scrolling action with diverse stages and fascinating diving attacks.
